mutants.original_line: counter = Counter(char for char in ''.join(words) if char in ascii_letters)
mutants.mutated_line: counter = Counter((char for char in ''.join(words) if char not in ascii_letters))

mutants.original_line: counter = Counter(char.lower() for char in ''.join(words) if char.lower() in ascii_letters)
mutants.mutated_line: counter = Counter((char.lower() for char in ''.join(words) if char.lower() not in ascii_letters))

mutants.original_line: counter = Counter(char for char in ''.join(words) if char in ascii_letters)
mutants.mutated_line: counter = Counter((char for char in 'MUTATED'.join(words) if char in ascii_letters))

mutants.original_line: counter = Counter(char.lower() for char in ''.join(words) if char.lower() in ascii_letters)
mutants.mutated_line: counter = Counter((char.lower() for char in 'MUTATED'.join(words) if char.lower() in ascii_letters))
